alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 11:42AM EST until December 12 at 12:15PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... New Hampshire... Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Maine...New Hampshire... Saco River At Conway affecting Oxford, Carroll and Cumberland Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Hallowell. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Parking lots along Front Street begin to flood. Town dock begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:20 AM EST Monday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage with a maximum value of 11.4 feet just after midnight tonight. The river will fall below flood stage overnight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
